bill.title: Relating To The Electronic Transmission Of Ballots.
bill.description: Authorizes a voter with special needs, including a disability, to request that a ballot be forwarded by electronic transmission at any time. (SD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to JUD, referral sheet 2
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-05-19 2:05PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-06-19.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-06-19 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, San Buenaventura, Brower, Creagan, McKelvey, Morikawa, Takayama, Yamane; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Say; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Lowen, Thielen.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 927), recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Passed Second Reading; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite excused (1).
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Nakashima excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 149).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-12-19 9:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, Wakai, Gabbard, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1669) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-01-19.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Senator(s) Harimoto, Ruderman). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 549) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 535).
Senate Conferees Appointed: K. Rhoads Chair; Gabbard, Kim, Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 898).
Reconsideration of action taken on 04-02-19.
Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 853).
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Holt excused (1).
Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 859).
Transmitted to Governor.
